string.text: Weapon Repair for Portable Workshop

A Loner mechanic wants me to repair a broken weapon, as a certification of skill for a portable workshop. I should bring it back once it's in excellent condition. There appears to be some maker's mark etched onto the weapon, which makes it difficult to pass off an identical gun of the same make.
I've scrounged some tools for a portable workshop if you're interested. The catch is that I need this particular weapon repaired.
Perfect! This is some really nice work - oh, here's the workshop as promised.
Weapon Repair for Portable Workshop

A Bandit mechanic wants me to repair a broken weapon, in exchange for a portable workshop. I should bring it back once it's in excellent condition. There appears to be some maker's mark etched onto the weapon, which makes it difficult to pass off an identical gun of the same make.
Yo, I've got this gun off some sucker last week but I haven't been able to work on it at all. If you work on it for me, I can get you some workshop tools.
Hey, hey, this looks good! Pristine, even. Ah, here's your workshop tools, man, as promised.
Weapon Repair for Portable Workshop

A Military mechanic wants me to repair a broken weapon, as a certification of skill for a portable workshop. I should bring it back once it's in excellent condition. There appears to be some maker's mark etched onto the weapon, which makes it difficult to pass off an identical gun of the same make.
HQ has cleared me for providing you with some workshop tools. I just need you to repair this weapon as proof of your skill, to make sure it will be used effectively.
I'm impressed, good work. Here's the portable workshop as discussed.
Weapon Repair for Portable Workshop

A Duty mechanic wants me to repair a broken weapon, as a certification of skill for a portable workshop. I should bring it back once it's in excellent condition. There appears to be some maker's mark etched onto the weapon, which makes it difficult to pass off an identical gun of the same make.
Hey, a recruit got his rifle chewed up during a mutant attack. It's in terrible shape. If you take care of it for me, I can put in a word about getting you some workshop tools.
Excellent! The rookie will be glad to not rely on their pistol from now on. Enjoy the tools.
Weapon Repair for Portable Workshop

A Mercenary mechanic wants me to repair a broken weapon for a portable workshop. I should bring it back once it's in excellent condition. There appears to be some maker's mark etched onto the weapon, which makes it difficult to pass off an identical gun of the same make.
I have another proposition. There's a weapon here that needs repair. Supposed to be spick and span for transport. In exchange, I have some surplus tools I can fashion into a portable workshop.
Looks like everything's in order. Thank you
Weapon Repair for Portable Workshop

A Clear Sky mechanic wants me to repair a broken weapon for a portable workshop. I should bring it back once it's in excellent condition. There appears to be some maker's mark etched onto the weapon, which makes it difficult to pass off an identical gun of the same make.
We've recovered some weapons from our recent expedition, but they're in pretty bad shape. You fix up one of them, and I can get you some workshop tools.
Awesome, man! We're slowly recovering our fighting strength. Here, the tools as promised.
Weapon Repair for Portable Workshop

A Freedom mechanic wants me to repair a broken weapon, as a certification of skill for a portable workshop. I should bring it back once it's in excellent condition. There appears to be some maker's mark etched onto the weapon, which makes it difficult to pass off an identical gun of the same make.
Alright man, I've had enough of these gun. Here, see if you can take a crack at it. If you can, I'll get you some of my tools, whaddaya say?
Goddamn, looks as good as new. Well, here's the tools then.
Weapon Repair for Portable Workshop

A Monolith mechanic wants me to repair a broken weapon. I should bring it back once it's in excellent condition. There appears to be some maker's mark etched onto the weapon, which makes it difficult to pass off an identical gun of the same make.
Our brothers require weapons faster than I can work. Restore this one to relieve my burden.
This is satisfactory. The Monolith bestows upon you these workshop tools as a reward.
Weapon Repair for Portable Workshop

An Ecologist mechanic wants me to repair a broken weapon for a portable workshop. I should bring it back once it's in excellent condition. There appears to be some maker's mark etched onto the weapon, which makes it difficult to pass off an identical gun of the same make.

We need this gun repaired soon. It looks like it may be involved in the death of one of our scientists, but my work is piling up. There's hardly any money around at the moment, but I can spare some workshop tools instead.
Superb, looks like we can use this. Hopefully this can be used to track down the killer. Thank you.
Weapon Repair for Portable Workshop

A Renegade mechanic wants me to repair a broken weapon, as a certification of skill for a portable workshop. I should bring it back once it's in excellent condition. There appears to be some maker's mark etched onto the weapon, which makes it difficult to pass off an identical gun of the same make.

Oi, we've took some surplus supplies from a convoy passing through here. Looks like tools for other mechanics around. I can pass them along to you, but I'll need to see if you can handle the work. Repair this junk for me.
Huh, I'll be damned, you followed through. Well, here's the tools as promised.
Weapon Repair for Portable Workshop

A Sin mechanic wants me to repair a broken weapon, as a certification of skill for a portable workshop. I should bring it back once it's in excellent condition. There appears to be some maker's mark etched onto the weapon, which makes it difficult to pass off an identical gun of the same make.
We ambushed people attempting to transport workshop tools through this place. They look like they'll be useful in your hands, but I must make sure. Here, take this broken weapon and restore it.
I knew I had a good eye. Here's the tools as promised.
Weapon Repair for Portable Workshop

A UNISG mechanic wants me to repair a broken weapon, as a certification of skill for a portable workshop. I should bring it back once it's in excellent condition. There appears to be some maker's mark etched onto the weapon, which makes it difficult to pass off an identical gun of the same make.

I have another proposition. The covert nature of our operations makes self-sufficiency a necessity in this place. If you're planning on deeper excursions, you'll need a portable workshop to mend your gear. I'll need to know you're up to the task first - clean up this gun for me.
This is in pristine condition, good work. Here's the portable workshop.
